T02D2831:176a-0: @176a * // bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs mgon po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2831:176a-1: dpal ldan 'od zer gzi brjid 'bar ba'i rgyal po ser sprin rab mthug sreg par mdzad //
T02D2831:176a-2: yig gnyis gdug pa'i stobs 'joms nga ro mi bzad nam mkha'i ngos la gang rgyangs sgrogs //
T02D2831:176a-3: zhal gsum phyag drug dkar dmar mthing ga aindra'i mdog ldan rdo rje mda' gzhu thal mo brdebs //
T02D2831:176a-4: me dpung sdigs mdzub ral gri'i gshog bsnams dbang po'i rgyal po spyan ras gzigs dbang la phyag 'tshal //
T02D2831:176a-5: de nas ser ba bzlog pa bshad par bya ste /
T02D2831:176a-6: lha dang klu la sogs pa khros pa dang /
T02D2831:176a-8: grong khyer pa rnams kyi don ma yin pa'i las kyi stobs las kyang rung ste /
T02D2831:176a-9: dus dang dus ma yin pa'i gnod pa ni 'di lta ste /
T02D2831:176a-11: rgya mtsho rlung gis bskyod pa'i rlabs lta bu'i sprin gyi phung po 'khrigs shing /
T02D2831:176a-12: 'brug gi sgra kun du mi bzad pas klad pa 'gems pa lta bu dang /
T02D2831:176a-13: gnam lcags dang ser ba drag po 'bab pa'i ltas ngan mngon du gyur pa na /
T02D2831:176a-14: byang chub sems dpa' grong khyer pa rnams dang /
T02D2831:176a-15: skye bo mang po la snying brtse bas gdung ba'i yid can /
T02D2831:176a-16: bdag gi don btang nas gzhan gyi nye bar mkho
T02D2831:176a-17: ba la lhag par chags pas zil gyis mnan pa
T02D2831:176a-18: dag /'byung po dpag tu med pa la phan pa
T02D2831:176a-20: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug drag po chen
T02D2831:176a-21: po 'od zer 'bar ba'i gzi brjid kyi rgyal po
T02D2831:176a-22: ltas ngan pa thams cad rnam par 'jig par mdzad
T02D2831:176a-23: pa'i rigs kyi rgyal po 'di yang dag par dran
T02D2831:176a-24: par bya'o // de zhal g-yas dkar lha bsrung ba //
T02D2831:176a-25: g-yon pa dmar po mi yi rje //
T02D2831:176a-26: dbus gnas mthing ga klu 'dul grags //
T02D2831:176a-27: spyan gsum mche gtsigs khros pa'o //
T02D2831:176a-28: g-yas g-yon dang po mda' gzhu'i phyag / gnyis pa gnyis ni thal mo brdebs //
T02D2831:176a-29: gsum pa'i phyag na me dpung ste //
T02D2831:176b-0: g-yon pa sdigs mdzub bsgreng @176b ba nyid //
T02D2831:176b-1: sgron shing dud mdog sku chen 'gying //
T02D2831:176b-2: ral gri'i gshog brgyangs spu 'thul pa //
T02D2831:176b-3: shin tu za byed rngam pa che //
T02D2831:176b-5: thugs ka lte bar pad nyir [?] ni //
T02D2831:176b-6: h'um phat sdo dang dmar ba yi //
T02D2831:176b-7: yi ge gnyis bsam sngags kyis bskor //
T02D2831:176b-8: de gsang sngags kyi rgyal po 'di//
T02D2831:176b-9: aom hr'i:a'ary'a ba lo ki te shva r'a ya aa
T02D2831:176b-10: ti kro dha ma h'a dza la sarba tu sa
T02D2831:176b-14: thal mo g-yas la pha dkar dang //
T02D2831:176b-15: g-yon la ta nag bkod nas ni //
T02D2831:176b-16: brdabs pas me lce 'bar ba yis //
T02D2831:176b-17: dpa' bos ser ba rnam par bzlog / mig gnyis nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang //
T02D2831:176b-18: smin ma khro gnyer glog rgyun dang //
T02D2831:176b-19: shangs las me stag zhal las kyang //
T02D2831:176b-20: lce 'bar phu: yis btab pas kyang //
T02D2831:176b-21: de las rang nyid 'dod thag gru //
T02D2831:176b-22: mkhas pas yid kyis mtshams bcad de //
T02D2831:176b-23: sprin tshogs 'o ma can gyi khri //
T02D2831:176b-24: bsnol bas chu gzhag gis byug bya //
T02D2831:176b-25: gang tshe dus la bab gyur pa //
T02D2831:176b-26: de tshe rngam pa'i stang stabs kyis //
T02D2831:176b-27: rngam par byas la me dpung 'bar //
T02D2831:176b-28: bskal pa'i me ltar mkha' ga yogs 'gyur //
T02D2831:176b-29: sngags phreng gsum mam bdun nam dgu //
T02D2831:176b-30: yang na nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod //
T02D2831:176b-31: skad cig de la rdo rje yi //
T02D2831:176b-32: pha bong nyid kyang zhu bar 'gyur //
